question: A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday. Write a letter to your friend.In your lettergive contact details for when you are awaygive instructions about how to care for your petdescribe other household duties
text: Hope you're okay. Thank you for agreeing to house-sit for me. It was a great relief as someone whom I can trust will be taking the responsibility for my home and the dog, Cavy, while I'll be away for a month-long trip to Dubai.

If you need anything at my place, please feel free to ring me on my mobile or on Whatsapp. Moreover, I'm leaving the contact details of Shangrila hotel, which I'll be staying using, on a sticky note which I've left on the kitchen door.

More importantly, I wanted to share the details of Cavy's routine. She needs to be fed twice daily so each morning and evening put a handful of pedigree in her dish. You will find these in the kitchen pantry. Also, please check throughout the day to make sure she has fresh water.

I would like you to water my plants, too. Although the indoor plants only need to be watered weekly,  the outdoor ones need water every other day. For security, clear my mailbox every day and keep the lawn lights on during the night.
